(3) vacate Ms. Maxwell's conviction on all counts and dismiss the S2 Indictment for pre-indictment delay, and (4) enter a judgment of acquittal as to all counts under Rule 29.
Dated: March 11, 2022 New York, New York
Respectfully submitted,
/s/ Christian R. Everdell
